featured.text: A typical room of a capsule hotel is roughly the length and width of a single bed, with sufficient height for a guest to crawl in and sit up on the bed.
The straps on the heel and toe control the length of the shoe, 25 the two on either side allow for different widths.

definition.zh_def: 寬度，指物體的橫向尺寸或範圍。
definition.en_def: The measurement or extent of something from side to side.
definition.example: The table has a width of two meters.
